data.description: ediff two strings based on suffix tree
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module produces the indices for common regions between two
    strings so that other programs/modules can build emacs ediff-like
    visual code inspect. Algorithm::Diff is record based. This module is
    purely character-based. It is implemented in C. The underlying
    algorithm is suffix tree based (E. Ukkonen. On-line Construction of
    Suffix Trees. Algorithmica, 14(3) pp249-260, 1995.)
